Context:
The George Brown College Contact Centre can be reached at 416-415-2000 or toll-free in Canada and the United States at 1-800-265-2002. For TTY, use 1-877-515-5559. The Contact Centre is available Monday - Thursday from 8:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m., and Fridays from 8:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m. They can assist with information about George Brown College, admissions, registration, student support services, campuses and locations, Accessible Learning Services, Career Services, Mental Health Supports, Financial Aid, and Student Residence.

Contact details for specific services are as follows:
- Admissions: 416.415.2000 (Press 2, then Press 0 to speak to a representative). Domestic students can email admissions@georgebrown.ca. International (Visa) Students should submit an inquiry.
- Accessible Learning Services: careerservices@georgebrown.ca or call 416-415-5000 ext. 5301.
- Career Services: Virtual Career advising appointments, St. James Campus: Tel. 416-415-5000 ext.2107, Email: letstalk@georgebrown.ca; Casa Loma Campus: Tel. 416-415-5000 ext.4585, Email: letstalkcl@georgebrown.ca; Waterfront Campus: Tel. 416-415-5000 ext.5370, Email: letstalkwf@georgebrown.ca.
- Mental Health Supports at GBC: collegeadvisor@georgebrown.ca.
- Financial Aid: FinAid@georgebrown.ca.
- Student Residence: housing@georgebrown.ca or call 416-415-5000 ext. 2.

The Financial Aid office can only be contacted by email.

George Brown College's address is P.O. Box 1015, Station B, Toronto, Ontario, Canada M5T 2T9.

For admissions inquiries related to George Brown College, contact the Contact Centre at 416.415.2000 (Press 2, then Press 0 to speak to a representative). For domestic students, email admissions@georgebrown.ca. For international (Visa) students, submit an inquiry.

The Student Residence is located at 80 Cooperage Street, Toronto ON M5A 0J3.
